function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contradictory findings on the correlation between temperature and COVID-19 transmission","Impact":"Inconsistent guidance for public health measures and risk mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive meta-analyses and consider regional factors to provide more accurate guidance","Technologies":"Data analytics, machine learning, and comprehensive modeling","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, and researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, and governments"},{"Description":"Negative impact of warm and sunny weather on compliance with 'stay-home' rules","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission due to reduced adherence to containment measures","Mitigation":"Implement targeted public health campaigns and reinforcement of containment measures during warm and sunny periods","Technologies":"Social media campaigns, community engagement, and public messaging","People":"Local communities, public health authorities, and policymakers","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities, and community organizations"}]}
